% Math definitions (one per line).
% This file is included in the LaTeX source code generated by Sphinx.
% conf.py reads it in and defines these macros for MathJax.
\newcommand{\dx}{\Delta x}
\newcommand{\dy}{\Delta y}
\newcommand{\dz}{\Delta z}
\newcommand{\dt}{\Delta t}
\newcommand{\km}{\,\text{km}}
\newcommand{\Diff}[2]{ \frac{\mathrm{d}#1}{\mathrm{d}#2} }
\newcommand{\diff}[2]{ \frac{\partial #1}{\partial #2} }
\newcommand{\var}[2]{ {#1}_{\text{#2}} }
\newcommand{\h}[1]{ \var{h}{#1} }
\newcommand{\T}[1]{ \var{T}{#1} }
\newcommand{\m}[1]{ \var{m}{#1} }
\newcommand{\ms}[1]{ \var{m^{*}}{#1} }
\newcommand{\psw}{p_{\text{water}}}
\newcommand{\pice}{p_{\text{ice}}}
\newcommand{\pmelange}{\bar p_{\text{melange}}}
\newcommand{\rhoi}{\rho_{\text{ice}}}
\newcommand{\rhow}{\rho_{\text{water}}}
\newcommand{\n}{\boldsymbol{n}}
\newcommand{\nx}{\n_{x}}
\newcommand{\ny}{\n_{y}}
\newcommand{\phimin}{\phi_{\mathrm{min}}}
\newcommand{\phimax}{\phi_{\mathrm{max}}}
\newcommand{\bmin}{b_{\mathrm{min}}}
\newcommand{\bmax}{b_{\mathrm{max}}}
\newcommand{\bq}{\mathbf{q}}
\newcommand{\Up}[2]{\operatorname{Up}\left(#1\big|#2\right)}
\newcommand{\uppair}[2]{\left\{\begin{matrix} #1 \\ #2 \end{matrix}\right\}}
% \div is taken
\newcommand{\Div}{\nabla \cdot}
\newcommand{\V}{\mathbf{V}}
\newcommand{\Wtill}{W_{\mathrm{till}}}
\newcommand{\zs}{z_{\text{sea level}}}
% Both \U and \u are taken
\newcommand{\uu}{\boldsymbol{u}}
\newcommand{\nz}{\n_{z}}
\newcommand{\td}[1]{t^{D}_{#1}}
\newcommand{\D}{\displaystyle}
\newcommand{\viscosity}{\nu}
\newcommand{\partI}{(2\tilde N_{xx} + \tilde N_{yy})}
\newcommand{\partII}{(\tilde N_{xy})}
% Blatter-Pattyn
\newcommand{\E}{\dot{\boldsymbol{\epsilon}}}
\newcommand{\exponent}{\frac{1-n}{2n}}
\newcommand{\p}[1]{\left(#1\right)}
\newcommand{\f}{\rho\, g\, \nabla s}
\newcommand{\Id}{\int_{\Omega}}
\newcommand{\Ib}{\int_{\partial\Omega}}
\newcommand{\Ibase}{\int_{\text{base}}}
\newcommand{\dphi}[2][i]{\diff{\varphi_{#1}}{#2}}
\newcommand{\dpsi}[2][i]{\diff{\psi_{#1}}{#2}}
\newcommand{\Hmin}{H_{\text{min}}}
\newcommand{\dbeta}{\diff{\beta}{\alpha}}
\newcommand{\K}[2]{K_{i,j,#1,#2}}
